title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 15 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 15 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Lord, who shall abide in thy tabernacle? who shall dwell in thy holy hill?
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，谁能寄居你的帐幕。能能住在你的圣山。

lineList.en: He that walketh uprightly, and worketh righteousness, and speaketh the truth in his heart.
lineList.cn: 就是行为正直，作事公义，心里说实话的人。

lineList.en: He that backbiteth not with his tongue, nor doeth evil to his neighbour, nor taketh up a reproach against his neighbour.
lineList.cn: 他不以舌头谗谤人，不恶待朋友，也不随夥毁谤邻里。

lineList.en: In whose eyes a vile person is contemned; but he honoureth them that fear the LORD. He that sweareth to his own hurt, and changeth not.
lineList.cn: 他眼中藐视匪类，却尊重那敬畏耶和华的人。他发了誓，虽然自己吃亏，也不更改。

lineList.en: He that putteth not out his money to usury, nor taketh reward against the innocent. He that doeth these things shall never be moved.
lineList.cn: 他不放债取利，不受贿赂以害无辜。行这些事的人，必永不动摇。
